title: File Manager
description: An interactive file explorer that allows users to create folders and files in a hierarchical tree structure, mimicking a real-world file system. Users can add new folders or files at any level, expand/collapse folders, and view file contents. This component demonstrates dynamic tree data handling and recursive UI rendering in React.

title: Pagination
description: Pagination handlingh both in front end and backend. This component allows users to navigate through large datasets by breaking them into smaller, manageable pages. It includes features like page size selection, next/previous navigation, and dynamic data loading based on the current page.
